price: Maka itulah Allah, Tuhan kamu yang sebenarnya; maka tidak ada setelah kebenaran itu melainkan kesesatan. Maka mengapa kamu berpaling (dari kebenaran)?
arabic: فَذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَاذَا بَعۡدَ ٱلۡحَقِّ إِلَّا ٱلضَّلَٰلُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصۡرَفُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fadhālikumu al-lahu rabbukumu al-ḥaqu famādhā baʿda al-ḥaqi illā al-ḍalālu fa-annā tuṣ'rafūna
